entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
